wikipedia_page.main: Frankie John Raymond (born 18 November 1992) is an English footballer who plays as a midfielder for Boreham Wood.

response: In October 2016, Hall-Johnson moved to his third club of the season, Braintree Town. He was sent off for a two-footed tackle on Frankie Raymond on 2 January 2017 in a 3–0 defeat at Dagenham & Redbridge. During his time at Braintree, he made 25 league appearances with 5 goals and 5 assists.
